markdownRemark.html: Situated near Cadiz, with a clubhouse that is a charming old farmhouse, surrounded by gorges and lakes, the two golf courses at this location are both spectacular. Both are quite different. The old course is a jewel with each hole different and challenging. Specifically 11, 13 and 18 are exceptional. The new course offers different challenges with more ripples, lots of bunkers and water.

frontmatter.title: San Roque Club
